# debugDescription

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the text classifier that’s suitable for output during debugging.

## Declaration

```swift
var debugDescription: String { get }
```

## Describing a text classifier

- **model**: The underlying Core ML model of the text classifier.
- **description**: A text representation of the text classifier.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the text classifier in a playground.
